name: Death Awaits (Spyro, ladismeanuctis)
description:
You thought you were alone.

Death Awaits is a horror-esque first person shooter game in which you must find your way out to escape alive.

Known issues:
>Alien Soldiers have some wack animations.
>Main menu music among other things wont play on launch.

Credits:
Programmers - Spyro, Sytoplis
Music & SFX - Curly Boi
Art (2D/3D) - Ladis, Notdura, Adobe Mixamo.

Most of the people that worked on this game were new to game development and we feel very proud to have this game released. Thank you for giving it a shot <3.
